AppPush.Title: Welcome to Collapse Launcher
AppPush.Message: Now you can install or migrate your existing game here. For more information/guides, please visit: https://github.com/neon-nyan/CollapseLauncher/Wiki

RegionPush.Title: Announcement regarding to maintenance for v5.7
RegionPush.Message: In regard of official announcement, the maintenance for SEA region will be happen on 10:00 - 16:00 (GMT+8). For more information, please check on each official media or Discord at: discord.gg/hi3

RegionPush.Title: Announcement regarding to maintenance for v5.7
RegionPush.Message: In regard of official announcement, the maintenance for EU and NA region will be happen on 05:00 - 11:00 (GMT+1 For EU) and 23:00 - 05:00 (GMT-5 For NA). For more information, please check on each official media or Discord at: discord.gg/hi3

RegionPush.Title: Announcement Regarding to v2.7 Update Delay
RegionPush.Message:
In regard of official statement, v2.7 was delayed due to "project progress". Compensation will be issued to every players in every week.
The compensation includes: 400 Primogems, 1 Fragile Resin, 7 Hero's Wits, 16 Mystic Enhancement Ores, and 120000 Mora.
This compensation will be issued from May 11th, 2022 until further announcement.
For more information, please visit HoYoLab or In-Game Announcement.

RegionPush.Title: Game Repair for Mainland China Region is Temporarily Unavailable
RegionPush.Message:
Game Repair functionality for Mainland China region is temporarily available due to difficulties on our back-end server. However, this feature will be back in the next update.
Apologize for the inconvenience.
